With your 'Personal e-Consultation Link' you can instantly tele-consult patients Your patients require No Downloads, Installs or Logins
We understand Doctor-Patient connect is important. You can create your own Patient group where you can share personal updates, articles and videos related to personal health and well being of your patients.
You get automated payouts in your bank account on weekly/monthly basis. Track your earnings anytime and generate periodic payment reports.
We believe experience is what matters the most. Create an exciting waiting room for your patients with pictures and videos to keep them engaged while they wait for you.
Generate and share e-Prescriptions with your patients in just one click via SMS/ Email
You can seek a second opinion from the comfort of your home. Gain access to esteemed doctors and practicing specialists. You also get to refer your patient to another doctor and receive referral requests from others.
Effectively accept, cancel, reschedule patient appointments & follow-ups in minimal clicks
